messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Kimmy
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oooooh, I *love* Naomi Aldort s writings.  I look forward to her articles online and in Natural Life magazine ( http://www.life.ca -- sister zine of Life
messages.messageBody:
On Jul 4, 2004, at 3:40 AM, Wendy E wrote:

> www.aldort.com (Naomi Aldort)

Oooooh, I *love* Naomi Aldort's writings. I look forward to her
articles online and in Natural Life magazine ( http://www.life.ca --
sister 'zine of Life Learning). If-I- ever wanted to have a phone
consult I'd be calling her up. :)

-Tracy-

messages.subject: Kimmy
messages.msgSnippet: I wanted to direct you to a couple of websites you may or may not have heard of. There are lots of resources on both pages and both of the women who run these
messages.messageBody:
I wanted to direct you to a couple of websites you may or may not
have heard of. There are lots of resources on both pages and both of
the women who run these sites also offer phone counseling. It
sounds as if this may be hard for you to swing based on the
circumstances you described but even if you could manage one session
it might be helpful. Regardless, there is some great info on these
sites.

www.naturalchild.org (Jan Hunt)
www.aldort.com (Naomi Aldort)

Good Luck!

Wendy
